price: Ee Ole wangu! Laiti nisingeli mfanya fulani kuwa rafiki!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا
footnotes: Na atasema kwa kujuta kuwafuata walio mpoteza: Laiti ningeli kuwa sikumsadiki fulani, ambaye nimemwachia aniongoze.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
